title: Audit a Key Software Vendor
description: An auditor assesses the risks associated with a critical third-party software-as-a-service (SaaS) vendor.

tasks.description: Review the contract and Service Level Agreement (SLA) with the vendor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor understands the contractual requirements for uptime and performance.

tasks.description: Obtain and review the vendor's latest SOC 2 Type II report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor analyzes the SOC 2 report to assess the vendor's control environment.

tasks.description: Identify that the SOC 2 report lists several control exceptions related to employee background checks and document this as a potential risk.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor flags a specific third-party risk to be monitored.
